channel.title: Client/Server help - PLEASE!
channel.description: Alright I've been running a RuneScape Private Server(RSPS) for a whiiiiile now. Never come upon an error such as this. Now, you see. My old computer had the same problem but it broke (so I got a new one, this one) and on EVERY .bat file, it posts an error.. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code] FOR EVERY FILE. I swear. Every .bat file it can't find the main file.. :/ Help? I've googled ALLL over. No one has a real solution to this.. :l Run Code[525]: [code] @echo off cd bin java client 0 live english game0 pause [/code]

item.title: Client/Server help - PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Alright I’ve been running a RuneScape Private Server(RSPS) for a whiiiiile now. Never come upon an error such as this. Now, you see. My old computer had the same problem but it broke (so I got a new one, this one) and on EVERY .bat file, it posts an error…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

FOR EVERY FILE. I swear. Every .bat file it can’t find the main file… Help?
I’ve googled ALLL over. No one has a real solution to this… :l
Run Code[525]:

@echo off
cd bin
java client 0 live english game0
pause

Read full topic
